title: Backend Developer Intern (Remote)
company_industry: Software Development, IT System Custom Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**About XR Solutions** 




 XR Solutions is a technology-driven company pioneering
 **machine learning-powered augmented reality solutions** 
 for industrial clients.
 



 Our mission is to revolutionize how machines are operated, maintained, and optimized — enabling workflows and innovations that were once impossible. We combine research-based optimizations with cutting-edge AR technology to create
 **practical, reliable, and high-performance solutions** 
 that reshape industries.
 



 This internship offers a rare opportunity to
 **build backend systems that directly power advanced AR applications** 
 used in real-world industrial environments.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We’re looking for a
 **passionate, detail-oriented Backend Developer Intern** 
 with a strong interest in
 **API development, system integration, and backend architecture** 
 .
 



 This is a
 **remote, hands-on role** 
 where you will work closely with experienced developers to design, implement, and maintain backend services that support our AR platforms.
 



 While this is initially
 **unpaid** 
 , exceptional performance may lead to a
 **paid position** 
 after the internship.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 



* **Develop APIs** 
 : Build and maintain high-performance REST APIs using
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Express.js** 
 .
* **Database Management** 
 : Work with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 and ORM tools (Sequelize) to design and optimize database schemas.
* **System Integrations** 
 : Assist in integrating backend services with AR platforms and machine learning pipelines.
* **Testing & Quality Assurance** 
 : Write and run
 **unit and integration tests** 
 to ensure stability and performance.
* **DevOps Support** 
 : Learn to work with
 **AWS cloud infrastructure** 
 and contribute to maintaining scalable, secure environments.
* **Troubleshooting & Maintenance** 
 : Help debug, patch, and optimize backend systems to improve reliability.
* **Code Reviews** 
 : Participate in peer reviews to maintain code quality and follow industry best practices.



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Proficiency in
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Express.js**
* Solid
 **JavaScript** 
 &
 **TypeScript** 
 skills
* Experience with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 (basic to intermediate)
* Familiarity with
 **AWS services** 
 (some training provided)
* Understanding of
 **Git** 
 (we use Bitbucket)
* Basic knowledge of
 **CI/CD pipelines**
* Awareness of
 **IT security fundamentals**
* (Bonus) Experience with
 **Sequelize ORM**



  





**What You’ll Gain:** 



* Hands-on experience building backend systems for
 **real-world AR applications**
* Exposure to
 **AWS-based scalable architectures**
* Experience with
 **industrial-grade API design, testing, and security**
* Involvement in a
 **live product launch**



  





 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in backend development.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer (Java/Javascript)
description:
**Välkommen till B3 Innovation – där teknik och trivsel går hand i hand!**
 Välkommen till B3 Innovation, hjärtat av systemutveckling inom B3 Consulting Group! Här kombinerar vi den familjära känslan från ett småföretag med storbolagets resurser.
   

  

 Vi är ett engagerat gäng med konsulter som specialiserar oss på systemutveckling inom Java och moderna JavaScriptramverk. I en miljö där du får möjlighet att växa både professionellt och personligt i en inkluderande gemenskap. Oavsett om du är en passionerad cyklist eller en bokslukare, så finns det plats för dig hos oss.
   

  

**Om rollen som fullstackutvecklare inom Java/** 
 Javascript på B3 Innovation
   

  

 Som Senior fullstackutvecklare hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar
* samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god erfarenhet och arbetat i fullstackrollen under en längre tid. Du som har hunnit både göra misstag och även lära av dem. Förhoppningsvis tycker du om att arbeta i team, dela med dig av dina kunskaper och vill fortsätta att lära dig nytt.
   

  

 Våra krav för att du ska passa i denna roll:
   

  

* Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet av utvecklarrollen.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med Java, Javascript, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med olika ramverk som React, Angular och Vue.
* Du har erfarenhet av att jobba i agila team.


**Varför B3 Innovation?**
* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och flexibilitet: Flexibilitet är centralt, vilket gör att du kan forma din arbetsdag för att få livspusslet att gå ihop. Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder därför flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Det handlar inte bara om “jobb jobb jobb” hos oss. Vi anordnar allt från tech-workshops till sociala aktiviteter som stickcaféer, spelkvällar och AW.


**Om B3 Innovation**
 Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi prioriterar personlig utveckling och erbjuder verktyg som B3 Academy, TechTalks och "Lunch & Learn" för att du ska kunna växa.
   

  

 Upptäck möjligheterna med B3 Innovation. Som utvecklare får du arbeta inom spännande branscher som media, bank och finans, energi, offentlig sektor, telekom och e-handel. Oavsett om du optimerar TV-sändningar, utvecklar digitala banktjänster eller skapar smarta hem, hjälper vi dig att hitta det perfekta uppdraget som matchar dina intressen.
   

  

 Våra toppbetyg i medarbetarundersökningar visar att nöjda kollegor är kärnan i vår framgång. Är du redo att kliva in i en miljö där utveckling och trivsel går hand i hand?
   

  

 Som sagt, välkommen till B3 Innovation – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se.

title: Senior Staff Software Engineer
description:
At Optimizely, we're on a mission to help people unlock their digital potential. We do that by reinventing how marketing and product teams work to create and optimize digital experiences across all channels. With Optimizely One, our industry-first operating system for marketers, we offer teams flexibility and choice to build their stack their way with our fully SaaS, fully decoupled, and highly composable solution.
   

  

 We are proud to help more than 10,000 businesses, including H&M, PayPal, Zoom, and Toyota, enrich their customer lifetime value, increase revenue and grow their brands. Our innovation and excellence have earned us numerous recognitions as a leader by industry analysts such as Gartner, Forrester, and IDC, reinforcing our role as a trailblazer in MarTech.
   

  

 At our core, we believe work is about more than just numbers -- it's about the people. Our culture is dynamic and constantly evolving, shaped by every employee, their actions and their stories. With over 1500 Optimizers spread across 12 global locations, our diverse team embodies the "One Optimizely" spirit, emphasizing collaboration and continuous improvement, while fostering a culture where every voice is heard and valued.
   

  

**The Role:**
 We're seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our Graph team and enhance the search functionality within our multi-tenant service. This role requires significant experience designing, implementing, and maintaining Elasticsearch/OpenSearch in a production environment. You will own projects from initial requirements gathering (PRD) through to successful completion, collaborating with customers to ensure solutions meet their specific needs.
   

  

 As part of our team, you'll contribute to building cutting-edge features leveraging serverless compute, auto-scaling OpenSearch clusters, and LLMs with Machine Learning nodes. We are a team that prioritizes high code quality in every commit.
   

  

**Why is this team critical to Optimizely?**
* Business Impact: Graph is the core content delivery and search service powering the SaaS version of our Content Management System (CMS). Our customers, who rely on Graph for their websites and mobile applications, demand high performance and advanced query capabilities to deliver exceptional user experiences. Graph's reliability and speed directly impact their business success.
* High Visibility & Innovation: Our roadmap prioritizes innovative content delivery and search features, placing search and AI at the forefront of our service offering. This focus differentiates us from competitors and empowers our customers to build cutting-edge web and mobile applications. You'll be instrumental in developing these differentiating features.
* Shape the Future of Digital Experiences: The team plays a critical role in shaping the future of our customers' digital presence. Your contributions will directly influence how they engage their audiences and achieve their business objectives through innovative search and content delivery experiences


**Experience Required:**
* 5+ years’ experience of developing and managing services in production
* Experience managing Elasticsearch / OpenSearch in production, with optimization of settings, shards, and replicas.
* Experience creating optimized Elasticsearch / OpenSearch queries
* Experience developing with TypeScript
* Expertise with API design and development of GraphQL or RESTful web services
* Partnering closely with internal stakeholders to gain a strong understanding of business and product data needs
* You find satisfaction in being a force multiplier for your colleagues
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or engineering or related experience require


**Some technologies we work with:**
* Elasticsearch / OpenSearch
* GraphQL, REST
* TypeScript, JavaScript, C#
* Cloudflare workers, Kubernetes


**What sets you apart:**
* Experience developing GraphQL APIs
* Experience in Kubernetes, Docker etc. and/ or serverless cloud stacks
* Experience developing multi-tenant services
* Experience of Machine Learning in Elasticsearch / OpenSearch
* Experience working with go-to-market teams
* Understanding the value of pair programming/TDD/Clean Code
* Exposure/Experience leveraging functional languages / paradigms


 Optimizely is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Optimizely is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

title: React Native Utvecklare till B3 Mobile
description:
B3 Mobile är dotterbolaget inom koncernen som är
 ***experter***
 på apputveckling. iOS, Android, Cross-platform - Vi kan det!
   

  

 Vi söker dig som vill ta nästa steg i din karriär. Du kanske har arbetat med React Native utveckling i några år och känner dig redo för något nytt. Håll i hatten, för hos B3 Mobile arbetar vi med några av världens mest spännande kunder baserade både i Stockholm och på andra sidan Atlanten.
   

  

 I rollen som React Native utvecklare kommer du att arbeta tillsammans med ett kompetent och passionerat gäng utvecklare, UX-designers och projektledare både in-house och ute hos kund.
   

  

**Vi letar efter dig som:**
* Har en bakgrund som civilingenjör eller motsvarande
* Besitter goda kunskaper i Svenska, både i tal & skrift
* Har 3+ års erfarenhet som React Native utvecklare
* Kunskap om skillnader mellan standarder och API:er för iOS- och Android-plattformarna
* Erfarenhet av att sätta upp CI/CD pipelines för mobila applikationer
* Arbetar med fokus på slutanvändarnas upplevelse
* Levererar högkvalitativ kod som är ren och lätt att förstå och utöka
* Är proaktiv och kommer med förslag på lösningar inom de projekt du arbetar med


**Intresset ska självfallet vara ömsesidigt. Det här erbjuder vi dig:**
* Möjlighet att arbeta med tekniskt utmanande lösningar hos många olika kunder med ett stort antal användare.
* Flexibilitet & en hybrid modell där vi ses på kontoret en dag i veckan för att träffa kollegor, jobba tillsammans och lära oss nya saker.
* En snabbrörlig, rolig och trygg arbetsplats där vi strävar efter balans både i arbetslivet och livet i stort.
* Friskvårdsbidrag att lägga på gymkort, padel, massage eller andra aktiviteter.
* Wellness satsning för att säkerställa ditt välmående på arbetsplatsen.


 Vi jobbar mycket med kompetensutveckling, du kommer att vidareutvecklas och utforska de senaste teknikerna tillsammans med hela teamet. Du får ett stort ansvar och arbetar både individuellt och i större team. Vi tror att vår energi och nyfikenhet, vårt sätt att välkomna olikheter och vår vilja att dela med oss av våra erfarenheter bidrar till att skapa en miljö där alla, inklusive du, kan växa och utvecklas.
   

  

 För mer information kontakta VD Camilla Landén på camilla.landen@b3.se

title: Solutions Architect
description:
**Lösningsarkitekter till B3 Visab Consulting**
 Hos B3 Visab Consulting stödjer vi finansindustrins utveckling i den digitala ekonomin. Vi söker nu fler engagerade lösningsarkitekter som vill vara med och bidra till en samhällskritisk bransch. Med över 40 års erfarenhet har vi byggt långsiktiga relationer med ledande aktörer inom bank och försäkring, och vår expertis gör oss även till en attraktiv partner för snabbfotade uppstickare.
   

  

**Om rollen:** 
 Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss får du möjligheten att arbeta som konsult i varierande uppdrag där du hjälper kunder att utveckla och implementera robust lösningsarkitektur. Du kommer till exempel att:
   

  

* Bryta ned krav och behov och omvandla dessa till förstklassiga lösningar.
* Designa och dokumentera olika arkitekturlösningar.
* Vägleda utvecklingsteamet och säkerställa att lösningen överensstämmer med den övergripande arkitekturen.
* Agera bollplank, ge råd och stöd till både verksamhet och utvecklare.


**Vidare ser vi att du har följande kvalifikationer:**
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet från lösningsarkitektrollen.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet från bank- eller försäkringsområdet.
* Kompetens och erfarenhet av integrationslösningar mellan applikationer/system.
* Färdigheter inom dokumentation.
* Erfarenhet från konsultrollen.
* Certifieringar och erfarenheter inom relevanta områden.
* Arbetar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


 Vi tror att framgång bygger på samarbete och kunskapsdelning och vi ser gärna att du är en lagspelare som uppskattar att arbeta prestigelöst och flexibelt.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv och flexibel lönemodell.
* Möjlighet att påverka dina arbetstider och arbetsplats.
* Tillgång till utbildningar och certifieringar för din professionella utveckling.
* En stark wellness-satsning genom Team B3, som främjar både hälsa och arbetsglädje.


**Varför B3 Visab Consulting?** 
 Vi är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Hos oss får du det bästa av två världar: kraften från ett stort bolag och den personliga samhörigheten från ett mindre. Vi är stolta över att ha blivit erkända som "Årets Karriärföretag" och av "Great Place to Work". Våra medarbetare pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetsmiljön där olikheter välkomnas, och stoltheten över att bidra till både kunders framgång och samhället i stort. Vi samarbetar med initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub och Pink Programming för att göra skillnad.
   

  

**Kontakt** 
 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Ansök nu! Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta Lidia Hagos (lidia.hagos@b3.se) eller konsultchef Hanna Skoog (+4670-260 12 65).

title: Senior Fullstackutvecklare inom Java
description:
**Senior Fullstackutvecklare inom Java till Accelerate at Iver!**
 Vill du ta din expertis inom fullstackutveckling till nästa nivå? Vi söker en skicklig utvecklare med lång erfarenhet av Java och moderna frontend-ramverk som vill vara med och bygga framtidens digitala lösningar tillsammans med oss på Accelerate at Iver.
   

  

**Varför Accelerate at Iver?**
 Vi erbjuder mer än bara ett uppdrag – vi erbjuder en plattform för att växa som expert inom modern mjukvaruutveckling! Hos oss får du inte bara arbeta med spännande teknik och kunder – du blir en del av ett värderingsdrivet, passionerat team där du får stora möjligheter till personlig utveckling och inflytande.
   

  

**Som Konsult Hos Oss Får Du**
 🎯 En skräddarsydd utvecklings- och certifieringsplan
   

  

 🚀 Utmanande och varierande kunduppdrag med den senaste tekniken
   

  

 🕊️ Flexibilitet, frihet och balans mellan jobb och fritid
   

  

 🛡️ En trygg och säker anställning med bra förmåner och kollektivavtal
   

  

 🤜🤛 Ett sammansvetsat team av vassa specialister som lyfter varandra
   

  

 Vi tror på gemenskap och kompetensutbyte – här utvecklas vi tillsammans och stöttar varandra för att alltid ligga i teknisk framkant.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som senior fullstackutvecklare inom Java hos oss är du en nyckelspelare i att utveckla stabila, moderna och skalbara applikationer. Du bidrar med både teknisk erfarenhet och ett agilt mindset i projekt som gör skillnad.
   

  

 Du arbetar både med backendlogik i Java och Spring Boot, och med moderna frontendramverk som React och Angular. Du jobbar nära DevOps och är bekväm med CI/CD, containerisering och molnmiljöer.
   

  

**Exempel på vad du kommer att göra i ditt konsultuppdrag:**
* Utveckla och underhålla mikrotjänstbaserade backendlösningar i Java/Spring Boot
* Skapa intuitiva och responsiva användargränssnitt med React, Angular eller liknande.
* Arbeta med databaser som MySQL och Oracle DB
* Bygga och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines för automatisk testning och leverans
* Arbeta med Docker och Kubernetes för containerhantering och orkestrering
* Delta i arkitektur- och designbeslut samt mentorera juniora kollegor


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har minst 8 års erfarenhet som fullstackutvecklare, med djup kompetens inom Java och erfarenhet av moderna webbteknologier. Du är lösningsorienterad, gillar att jobba nära verksamheten och har ett öga för både teknik och användarvärde. Du har en akademisk utbildning med inriktning mot systemutveckling, webbutveckling eller liknande.
   

  

 Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift. För denna position krävs svenskt medborgarskap, vi utför även bakgrundskontroll av slutkandidat
   

  

**Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av några av följande:**
* Java, Spring Boot
* TypeScript/JavaScript
* React, Angular eller liknande
* MySQL, Oracle DB
* CI/CD-verktyg
* Docker och Kubernetes


**Extra Plus Om Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av molnlösningar (t.ex. Azure, AWS eller GCP)
* Erfarenhet av testautomatisering och TDD
* Certifieringar inom Java eller molnplattformar
* Erfarenhet av systemarkitektur eller teknisk ledarroll


**Placeringsort**
 📍 Accelerate at Iver finns på flertal orter i Sverige och Norge. För denna tjänst utgår du från vårt kontor i Solna, med möjlighet till hybridarbete.
   

  

**Vi intervjuar löpande – vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan!**
 👉 Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Har du frågor? Kontakta Jesper Carlsson på jesper.carlsson@iver.se
   

  

**Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig. Välkommen till Accelerate at Iver!** 
 🚀

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
**Big news:** we’ve raised funding from one of Scandinavia’s largest consulting groups, **Aura**—a €100M+ revenue powerhouse with clients like Porsche, Samsung, and Adidas. This partnership gives us enterprise distribution from day one. Now we’re hiring a **senior frontend engineer** to help us scale an AI-powered workspace that routes the right information to the right person at the right time—beautifully.

**Why this role?**

We’re moving from POC to product, with budget, customers in the pipeline, and an urgent roadmap. You’ll own the web experience end-to-end: architecture, performance, accessibility, testing, deployment, and the design system that ties it all together.

**What you’ll own**

* Lead React/TypeScript development across our app (component architecture, state management, data-fetching, caching).
* Establish a **design system** + component library (tokens, theming, a11y, documentation).
* Drive **performance** (Core Web Vitals), **accessibility** (WCAG 2.1 AA), reliability, and **observability**.
* Shape the frontend **architecture** (SSR/SSG, routing, API contracts) in partnership with product and backend.
* Ship fast: define CI/CD for the web, testing strategy (unit, integration, E2E), feature flags, release cadence.
* Mentor teammates, conduct reviews, and raise the quality bar.
* Collaborate on AI-powered UX (prompt UIs, streaming states, background jobs, eval surfaces).

**Our stack**

* **React + TypeScript**, **Tailwind**
* Testing: Jest/Vitest, React Testing Library, Playwright/Cypress
* Data: REST/GraphQL; client caching (React Query/TanStack Query, SWR)
* **AWS** (nice to have and very welcome): S3/CloudFront, Lambda/API Gateway, Cognito, DynamoDB/RDS, CloudWatch
* Node/Express on the backend

**You’re a great fit if you have**

* **5+ years** building production web apps, with **3+ years deep in React/TypeScript**.
* Shipped and maintained complex SPAs/SSR apps used by real customers.
* Mastery of component composition, state management, performance tuning, and a11y.
* Strong testing discipline and CI/CD know-how.
* Product sense: turning fuzzy ideas into elegant, fast, reliable interfaces.
* Comfortable designing APIs with backend peers and mentoring other engineers.
* Located within **CET ±2 hours** and excellent written/spoken English.

**Extra spark (nice to have)**

* Experience with **AWS** infra (S3, CloudFront, Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito) or IaC (CDK/Terraform)
* Building internal tooling/design systems, Storybook, Chromatic/visual testing
* Integrating AI/ML services (e.g., OpenAI APIs) and designing resilient UX around them
* Open source, side projects, or writing/speaking about frontend craft

**How we work**

We’re pragmatic builders who use every tool (including AI) to move fast without breaking quality. We focus on outcomes, learn in public, and iterate weekly. You’ll have direct access to the founding team and real ownership of the product surface.

What we offer

* Competitive **contract rate** with room to grow + potential equity
* Flexible remote setup
* Real impact: ship to production weekly, shape the roadmap, see your work used
* A culture that values autonomy, craftsmanship, and thoughtful speed

**Interview flow (lightweight, senior-friendly)**

* Intro chat (product, team, your goals)
* Technical deep-dive (your past work, architecture, tradeoffs)
* Systems/UX design session + brief pairing on a real component or an optional small take-home (your choice)
* Team meet-and-greet & offer

**Ready to apply?**

Send us:

* GitHub/portfolio or a couple of shipped projects
* A short note on a frontend problem you’re proud you solved (and how)a
* Your timezone and earliest start date
* Resume

**Email:** careers@synca.ai

*P.S. If you’re excited about building exceptional React experiences and leveling up a product from 0→1→N, we want to hear from you—even if you don’t tick every box.*

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Pay: 50 000,00kr - 60 000,00kr per month

Work Location: Remote

title: Strategic Product Manager/Head of Product Management - Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)
description:
**Job Description**
**Strategic Product Manager/Head of Product Management - Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)**
 We are looking for a
 **Strategic Product Manager** 
 who wants to be part of Tietoevry Banking. Tietoevry Banking is the leading financial services software and solution partner in the Nordics. We offer modular, pre-integrated banking as a service solutions and market-leading software for core, payments, credit, cards, financial fraud, and wealth. With our scale, expertise, and specialization, we empower financial institutions to enhance agility, efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.
   

  

**When Joining Tietoevry Banking You Will Work On**
* Product Vision and Strategy: Develop and communicate a clear product vision and mid-term/long-term strategy that aligns with the company's overall Strategy, objectives and market trends. Define target customers, licensing and pricing models to address predictable long-term revenue flow. Define complementary services to support successful implementation and maintenance, ensure additional revenue flow.
* Market Analysis: Conduct in-depth market research to understand industry trends, competitive landscape, regulatory changes and customer needs, providing input and recommendations for strategic decisions for mid-term and long-term initiatives. Identify opportunities for product innovation and differentiation.
* Roadmap Development: Ability to translate market needs and business opportunities to a strategic roadmap and balance long/short-term needs. Create and maintain a high-level product roadmap that outlines key milestones, deliverables, and timelines, ensuring alignment with business priorities. Address product lifecycles, including planning sunsetting and migration strategies. Define innovation inception approaches. Plan portfolio modernization to fit market needs, ensure future growth and competitive costs.
* Relationship Building: Establish and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, partners, and industry influencers to create new business opportunities. Participate, present and be influencer in conferences, industry workgroups. Build relationships with industry stakeholders globally. Demonstrate cultural awareness and the ability to adapt product strategies to various regional requirements.
* Stakeholder management: Collaborate closely with the sales team and engage with other departments, including engineering, marketing, project management and customer teams, to support with sales and ensure successful product development and launch. Cooperate cross-units in Cards and Transaction Banking and other units in Banking.
* Customer Insights: Prepare and present vision, pitches, and presentations to existing and potential clients and partners, effectively communicating the value proposition. Gather and analyze customer feedback and usage data to inform product decisions and enhance user experience.
* Performance Metrics: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure product success and identify areas for improvement, ensure data-based decision making. Keep accountability on product/service profitability. Align models and use cross unit template and processes.
* Go-to-Market Strategy: Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to develop and execute effective go-to-market strategies for product launches and updates. Collaborate with Security, Compliance and Privacy teams to identify market or country potential risks and opportunities.
* Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure successful product delivery and adoption.
* Leadership and Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to product managers and team members, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement.


**Who We Are Looking For**
* A Bachelor's degree in business, Marketing, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred.
* Proven experience in product management, with a focus on strategic planning and execution.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
* Experience in Cards and Payments, with a large network of connections with industry experts and decision-makers.
* Familiarity with European and Nordic customers.


**We Also Believe You Have**
* Strong strategic thinking skills to develop and implement effective product strategies.
* A market and customer focus that drives product innovation and meets customer needs.
* Excellent relationship-building abilities to establish connections with clients, partners, and industry stakeholders.
* Proficiency in public speaking to effectively present ideas and influence audiences.
* Strong negotiation and influencing skills to advocate for product initiatives and secure buy-in.
* A creative mindset that fosters innovation and the development of unique solutions.
* A results-oriented approach that emphasizes accountability and achievement of product goals.


 As a person, we believe you are a team player who takes action and demonstrates responsibility to organize your work and solve your tasks. With our agile end-to-end development process, you will continue to both learn from and coach your colleagues, so communication is important for us. Technology is developing fast, so learning new cutting-edge technologies is something you strive to do.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, an open culture, and an outstanding work-life balance!
* We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working.
* Competitive salary (up to 7,000 EUR gross per month in Latvia), based on experience and qualifications.
* Finally, we believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.


**Did we get you inspired?**
 We look forward to your application! Interviews will be held continuously, so we encourage you to apply today! For more information or questions, please contact the Talent Acquisition team at recruitmentinbanking@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

 Location: Rīga - Verde, Roberta Hirša 1
   

  

*On specific positions, we might perform background checks.*
**About Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust, and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
   

  

 Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion, and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs. Familiarize yourself with what we do.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.

title: QA Lead
description:
**Why join us?**
 We’re on a mission to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. As the world-leader in assistive communication solutions, we empower our customers to express themselves, connect with the world, and live richer lives.
   

  

 At Tobii Dynavox, you can grow your career within a dynamic, global company that has a clear, impactful purpose - with the flexibility to also do what truly matters to you outside of work. What’s more, you’ll be part of a work culture where collaboration is the norm and individuality is welcomed.
   

  

 As a member of our team, you’ll have the power to innovate for good. You’ll see your ideas in use in new applications, work with the latest technology on leading platforms, and deliver meaningful solutions for our customers.
   

  

 As a
 **QA Lead** 
 , you will play a critical role in ensuring the quality and stability of our life-changing assistive communication solutions. You will lead the charge in testing both manual and automated solutions for our web-based and installed applications, enabling individuals with disabilities to communicate and engage with the world.
   

  

 You’ll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and product managers to uphold and elevate the user experience through robust QA practices. This role is both hands-on and strategic, balancing test execution with leadership and coaching to drive quality at every stage of development.
   

  

**In this role, you will:**
* Lead and execute manual test plans across platforms, including web and device-based applications.
* Identify opportunities for automation and drive the implementation of efficient, reliable test coverage.
* Maintain and evolve existing test suites, collaborating with stakeholders to align on quality metrics.
* Support a quality-first culture by mentoring developers and QA engineers in best practices.
* Analyze test execution data and report meaningful insights to improve product quality and development cycles.
* Partner closely with software development teams to understand product features and test accordingly.


**What We're Looking For:**
 We are looking for someone who has:
   

  

* At least 7 years of QA experience, including 3+ years in a lead or mentorship role.
* Proven experience with both manual testing and test automation across modern technology stacks.
* A strong grasp of testing strategy, prioritization, and quality metrics.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly articulate test outcomes, risks, and recommendations.
* A collaborative and hands-on mindset with the ability to influence teams toward quality-driven practices.
* A degree in engineering, computer science, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).


**Bonus Points For:**
* Experience or familiarity with testing in .NET / C# and Azure environments. While not a requirement, this would be valuable as many of our applications are built in .NET and run on Azure.
* Experience working with assistive communication technologies or Picture Communication Symbols (PCS).
* A keen eye for detail and the ability to reproduce complex issues reliably.
* Familiarity with Agile development practices and CI/CD pipelines.
* Passion for inclusive technology and a desire to contribute to a mission-driven organization.


 Apply today!
   

  

 We believe in empowering individuals - including our own employees - to reach their full potential. So, if you want to change lives while growing your own career, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Enterprise Architect – Digital Transformation
description:
**Why Join Us?**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our solutions.
   

  

 As our Enterprise Architect, you will be the visionary force behind our digital evolution, designing the technical architecture that will transform how we operate. You will go beyond implementation to actively shape our strategy, collaborating with leadership to turn bold ideas into transformative solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in revolutionizing our approach to data—creating an event-driven ecosystem where insights are embedded directly into workflows and presented to employees when and where they need them. You will lead our transition from legacy systems to modern technologies that enhance responsiveness, empower teams with real-time information, and create new business opportunities through seamless integration and automation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
**Strategic Vision & Innovation**
* Pioneer our digital transformation strategy, identifying emerging technologies and approaches that will deliver competitive advantages
* Transform high-level business objectives into concrete technical architecture and implementation roadmaps
* Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across technical teams
* Evaluate legacy systems and develop strategies for modernization that align with our business goals


**Technical Architecture Leadership**
* Design and implement enterprise architecture that enables real-time data processing, analytics, and insights
* Develop scalable, secure frameworks for integrating next-generation technologies into our existing platforms
* Lead the evolution from batch processing to event-driven architectures that enable instant data availability and action
* Maximize the potential of our core platforms (Microsoft D365 F&O, Azure integration services, and Salesforce) while planning for future innovation


**Data Transformation & Governance**
* Architect our transition to a real-time data ecosystem where insights are embedded directly into workflows
* Establish robust data governance practices that maintain quality, security, and compliance in a dynamic environment
* Design systems where employees don't need to look for data—it's presented to them when needed


**System Modernization**
* Develop a comprehensive strategy for replacing legacy systems that balances innovation with business continuity
* Create architectural blueprints that leverage our existing platform investments while incorporating modern approaches
* Implement solutions that improve efficiency, reduce technical debt, and enhance user experience
* Ensure seamless integration between modernized systems and our core platforms


**Skills & Experience**
* 8+ years of experience in enterprise architecture, with demonstrable success leading digital transformation initiatives
* Expertise in modern data architecture, particularly event-driven systems and real-time processing
* Experience integrating and extending enterprise platforms such as Microsoft Dynamics 365, Azure, and Salesforce
* Proven track record designing and implementing scalable, enterprise-grade technology solutions
* Strong understanding of legacy system modernization approaches and integration strategies
* Experience with event-driven architecture and real-time data processing frameworks
* Strong understanding of data governance, security, and compliance requirements
* Exceptional communication skills with the ability to translate technical concepts for stakeholders as well as being a technical leader able to engage and inspire contributors
* Strategic mindset with the ability to connect technology decisions to business outcomes


**Why Join Us**
 Join us at a pivotal moment in our transformation journey. You will have the opportunity to shape our technical direction and the resources to implement your vision. Your work will directly impact every aspect of our business—from customer experience to operational efficiency. You will be instrumental in our shift to an event-driven organization where data flows seamlessly across systems and empowers employees at every level. You will work with our established platform investments while defining the next generation of our technology landscape. If you are passionate about modernizing legacy systems and reimagining how organizations use data, this role offers the perfect blend of strategic thinking and hands-on architecture.
   

  

**Our Values:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, our mission guides what we do, and our values guide us in how we do it. Across the organization, we are committed to being Collaborative, Considerate, Curious and Courageous. We build a trusting environment where every team member prioritizes our customers with empathy and insight. Bold ideas and learning lead to impactful solutions. Driven by curiosity, we continuously challenge the status quo to create meaningful, customer-focused solutions for our customers.
   

  

**What We Offer:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we believe in empowering individuals – including our employees - to reach their full potential. Here’s what makes us unique:
   

  

* Purpose-Driven Work: Join a company that transforms lives by giving a voice to those with communication challenges. Every day, your work makes a meaningful and concrete impact.
* “Yes, and...” Flexibility: Build a rewarding career AND enjoy time with loved ones. We offer flexible work options so you don’t have to choose between personal and professional goals.
* Growth and Development: Whether you’re advancing your skills or growing your career, we invest in your future with training, learning opportunities, and internal growth paths.
* Inclusive and Supportive Culture: Work in a collaborative, caring environment where diversity and individuality are valued. You’ll feel connected to both your team and our global community.
* A Global Leader with Heart: Be part of an innovative, forward-thinking company that combines experience and cutting-edge solutions with a mission to change lives.

title: Executive Assistant, Amazon Web Services, Northern Europe
description:
**Description**
 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is seeking a proactive, customer obsessed and team oriented Executive Assistant to support the Managing Director and the Technical Director of AWS Europe North. This role requires attention to detail, organizational skills, and the ability to meet tight deadlines. The candidate will be comfortable in a fast-paced, fluid environment, while maintaining great flexibility, a sense of humor and composure. The candidate will work autonomously on many projects as required and possess the ability to complete a high volume of tasks with minimal guidance or supervision.
   

  

 Amazon EAs are the primary point of contact and information flow to and from a variety of teams, clients and partners to our senior leaders - we seek to hire and then offer continual development to the very best EAs ready to work in our fast paced, customer focused organization.
   

  

 We are looking for bright and motivated candidates with experience of supporting multiple executives and who can demonstrate expertise with complex diary management, travel arrangements and expense recording as well as the set-up, budgeting and active management of small to mid-scale events for their teams.
   

  

 Superior attention to detail and the ability to meet tight deadlines and juggle multiple requests is critical. Integrity and discretion in handling confidential information and professionalism in dealing with senior executives is imperative. A flexible approach is a must, and the ability to change direction at a moment’s notice.
   

  

 As a community, the EAs work together to deliver large scale events and to share workload when priorities demand additional support - commitment to teamwork is essential.
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

 AWS Global Sales drives adoption of the AWS cloud worldwide, enabling customers of all sizes to innovate and expand in the cloud. Our team empowers every customer to grow by providing tailored service, unmatched technology, and unwavering support. We dive deep to understand each customer's unique challenges, then craft innovative solutions that accelerate their success. This customer-first approach is how we built the world's most adopted cloud. Join us and help us grow.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 AWS values curiosity and connection. Our employee-led and company-sponsored affinity groups promote inclusion and empower our people to take pride in what makes us unique. Our inclusion events foster stronger, more collaborative teams. Our continual innovation is fueled by the bold ideas, fresh perspectives, and passionate voices our teams bring to everything we do.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience with reconciling expenses
* Substantial experience assisting at the executive level in a fast-paced environment
* Highly proficient with Microsoft Office, specifically Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint
* Experience coordinating and communicating using tools like Slack
* Experience with domestic and international travel coordination


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Senior experience assisting at the executive level
* Ability to quickly learn organizational structures, team objectives and adopt Amazon values and vision
* Ability to handle administrative details independently while exercising good judgment in keeping team members adequately informed
* Creative approach to problem solving and event planning
* Ability to handle confidential information with discretion, and deal with professionals inside and outside the company
* Ability to work in a highly ambiguous and changing environment with composure


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
